core.tut.pori.context

Class DAOHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.context.DAOHandler

  • public class DAOHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The DAO handler. This class can be used to retrieve instances of the DAOs defined by the database context configuration and sub-classed DAO class implementations.
